member.summary: Gets or sets the object used as the data source for the current tree view control.

member.name: P:C1.Win.TreeView.BindingInfo.DataMember
member.summary: Gets or sets a name of a specific record set within the DataSource.
member.remarks: You can set the data member for all levels using square brackets: FirstLevel\\[AllOtherLevels]

member.name: P:C1.Win.TreeView.BindingInfo.CheckedFieldName
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of fields to be used for binding with checkboxes depending on the level of the node.
member.remarks: Last field name sets the field to be used on all of the following levels.

member.name: P:C1.Win.TreeView.BindingInfo.DisabledFieldName
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of fields to be used for binding with enabled properties depending on the level of the node.
member.remarks: Last field name sets the field to be used on all of the following levels.

member.name: P:C1.Win.TreeView.BindingInfo.ParentKeyField
member.summary: Gets or sets a value representing the data source field identifying the parent record in this data source.

member.name: P:C1.Win.TreeView.BindingInfo.KeyField
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying the key field of the data source bound to the tree view control.
member.remarks: You can set the key field for all levels using square brackets: FirstLevel\\[AllOtherLevels]

member.summary: Only one node can be selected.

member.name: F:C1.Win.TreeView.C1TreeViewSelectionMode.Multi
member.summary: You can select multiple nodes from all nodes.

member.name: F:C1.Win.TreeView.C1TreeViewSelectionMode.MultiSibling
member.summary: You can select multiple only sibling nodes with the same parent node.

member.summary: Any node can not be selected.

member.summary: No borders.

member.name: T:C1.Win.TreeView.C1TreeViewEditMode
member.summary: Specifies how a user starts cell editing in the control.

member.name: F:C1.Win.TreeView.C1TreeViewEditMode.EditOnEnter
member.summary: Editing begins when Enter is pressed while the cell has focus.

member.name: F:C1.Win.TreeView.C1TreeViewEditMode.EditOnF2
member.summary: Editing begins when F2 is pressed while the cell has focus. This mode places the selection point at the end of the cell contents.

member.name: F:C1.Win.TreeView.C1TreeViewEditMode.EditOnKeystroke
member.summary: Editing begins when any alphanumeric key is pressed while the cell has focus.

member.name: F:C1.Win.TreeView.C1TreeViewEditMode.EditOnKeystrokeOrF2
member.summary: Editing begins when any alphanumeric key or F2 is pressed while the cell has focus.

member.name: F:C1.Win.TreeView.C1TreeViewEditMode.EditProgrammatically
member.summary: Editing begins only when the method is called.

member.summary: Specifies type of the bound mode.

member.name: F:C1.Win.TreeView.BindingMode.OneWay
member.summary: The bound data source will not update after tree view hierarchy change.

member.name: F:C1.Win.TreeView.BindingMode.TwoWay
member.summary: The bound data source will update after tree view hierarchy change.

member.name: P:C1.Win.TreeView.C1TreeView.ButtonImageList
member.summary: Gets the image list that is used to indicate the state of expand buttons.
member.remarks: When the ButtonImageList property is set, each that is contained in the displays the first and second images from the ButtonImageList to indicate an expaneded or collapsed state, respectively. Additionally the can displays the eight state of expand button if the ButtonImageList property contains eight images with keys: CollapsedNormal, CollapsedHot, CollapsedPressed, CollapsedDisabled, ExpandedNormal, ExpandedHot, ExpandedPressed, ExpandedDisabled.

member.name: P:C1.Win.TreeView.C1TreeView.CheckImageList
member.summary: Gets the image list that is used to indicate the state of the and its nodes.
member.remarks: When the CheckImageList property is set, each that is contained in the displays the first and second images from the CheckImageList to indicate an unchecked or checked state, respectively. Additionally the can displays the twelve state of checkbox if the CheckImageList property contains twelve images with keys from CheckBoxState enum.
